com.soccerbuddy.data

Interface DataSource<E,K>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - the model/entity object type
    K - the entity key type

    public interface DataSource<E,K>
    The utility that helps query/persist data from/to the data store.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    mystarrocks

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteExisting(E e)
      Deletes an existing entity from the data store.
      Optional<E> findOne(K keyProperty)
      Finds and returns an entity from the data store with the given key property.
      Optional<E> findOne(com.googlecode.objectify.Key<K> key)
      Finds and returns an from the data store with the given key.
      E insertNew(E e)
      Inserts a new entity into the data store.
      E updateExisting(E e)
      Updates an existing entity in the data store.

    • Method Detail

      • insertNew

        E insertNew(E e)
        Inserts a new entity into the data store.

        Analogous to a put() operation.

        Parameters:
        e - the entity to be inserted into the data store
        Returns:
        the inserted copy of the entity possibly with updated properties indicating a successful insertion
        See Also:

      • deleteExisting

        void deleteExisting(E e)
        Deletes an existing entity from the data store.

        Analogous to a delete() operation.

        Parameters:
        e - the entity to be removed from the data store
        See Also:

      • updateExisting

        E updateExisting(E e)
        Updates an existing entity in the data store.

        Analogous to a put() operation.

        Parameters:
        e - the entity to be updated in the data store
        Returns:
        the updated copy of the entity possibly with updated properties indicating a successful update
        See Also:

      • findOne

        Optional<E> findOne(com.googlecode.objectify.Key<K> key)
        Finds and returns an from the data store with the given key.

        Analogous to a query() operation

        Parameters:
        key - the key to find the entity from the data store
        Returns:
        an entity from the data store with the given key (or null if one was not found) wrapped in an Optional
        See Also:

      • findOne

        Optional<E> findOne(K keyProperty)
        Finds and returns an entity from the data store with the given key property.
        Parameters:
        keyProperty - the key property to find the entity from the data store
        Returns:
        an entity from the data store with the given key property (or null if one was not found) wrapped in an Optional
        See Also:
